content.question: The excerpt best reflects which of the following developments?

choices.label: The establishment of tariffs on textiles to protect domestic cotton production
The emergence of an abolitionist movement during the Second Great Awakening
The increase of prosperity caused by the production of manufactured goods
The development of regional cultures increasingly defined by the presence of enslaved people

content.answer: The development of regional cultures increasingly defined by the presence of enslaved people

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
